snippet.title: Virtual MIDI Piano Keyboard
snippet.description: Virtual MIDI controller for Linux, Windows and OSX

snippet.title: Piano Game
snippet.description: This is a very early version of what eventually became Synthesia (originally Piano Hero). This version of the source has had any uses of the Synthesia trademark removed. To find the current project, check http://www.synthesiagame.com

snippet.title: Midi Sheet Music
snippet.description: Midi Sheet Music is a free program that plays MIDI music files while highlighting the piano notes and sheet music notes. Works on Windows, Mac OS X, and Ubuntu Linux.

snippet.title: Clementi
snippet.description: Clementi is a MIDI application to practice piano. It loads notes from MIDI files and highlights them on a virtual piano. The application waits for inputs from a keyboard controller before displaying the next ones.

snippet.title: Tears in Heaven with Canon in D
snippet.description: Piece of music transcribed from MsHeyou performance on YouTube

snippet.title: Lyra Pro
snippet.description: Open Source project for Lester Hands' Lyra for Tandy color computer

snippet.title: OSC Piano Server
snippet.description: Server application for OSC piano for iOS
